page.title: 19LOWER DARNFORD FARMHOUSE
page.content: On monday 3rd of June 13 third year children from{Mount Pleasant Junior} {school}Shrewsbury set off for Lower Darnford Farm.We went with Mr Carruthers our Headmaster, Miss Wall our teacher, and{Mr Taylor}a lecturer from{Chester College.}We surveyed the surrounding hedges.It was interesting to see what was growing in each hedge.On Tuesday morning we worked on a group of trees half a mile downstream from the farm house.They were mostly{beech,sycamore}and {scots pine.}We worked in groups making a survey of what we saw growing in and around each tree ,where the tree was positioned,what the tree looked and felt like, taking measurements and estimating the age.We made sketches and took notes.Afterwards we sat still and listened to the sounds we could hear around us.
